entry.title: WIND WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 09:34 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
